elements.label: Rumours
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 1</color></size>

Things happened. People are talking.

elements.label: Investigation
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 2</color></size>

The Local Authorities have taken an interest in me and have begun to collect information.

elements.label: Under Arrest
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 3</color></size>

The Local Authorities are trying to find and arrest me for further questioning.

elements.label: Wanted
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 4</color></size>

The Local Authorities are willing to pay anyone to put an end to my activities...
